short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: get an alert with the Post ID of the current post when viewing the facebook post with comments page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of searching through the source files to find the Post ID of a facebook post when building ads? Install this extension and chrome will alert you of the Post ID whenever you open the Facebook Post with Comments page.
